Summary I develop tools, from workflow solutions to customer-facing applications, to increase the effectiveness of support operations. Building things that help to improve people's lives is my passion - right now, I help make the jobs of our support staff more pleasant. I've also developed applications to track group expenses and provide educational solutions. 
 
Regardless of my job role, I aim to always stay challenged and keep learning. As long as I'm making things, helping people, and learning a lot, I'm happy.
